name: Trash Cans
description: Trash Cans is an amazing, addictive, challenging and a very entertaining game. This beautiful game can be played using your thumbs and taping over the trash cans at the right time in order to open their lid and collect as much trash as you can. You can spend Trash Coins to buy new trash and faster opening trash can lids. Trash Cans game offers four different beautiful scenes so you can enjoy the gameplay as much as possible. Also, Trash Cans gives away a new gift every six hours. So, take advantage of every opportunity in this game. We wish you the best record!
